body:
Can you post a minimally reproducible example, i.e. something where we could fully copy / paste what you've provided and recreate?

FWIW the numbers you have exceed the int64 limit so my guess is there's some issue with maintaining the unsigned portion of that throughout the process

@WillAyd Thanks for your advice. I have modified my code. Furthermore, I tested on other environment, it raise Exception in converting to_json:

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/pandas/core/generic.py", line 859, in to_json
    default_handler=default_handler)
  File "/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/pandas/io/json.py", line 34, in to_json
    date_unit=date_unit, default_handler=default_handler).write()
  File "/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/pandas/io/json.py", line 77, in write
    default_handler=self.default_handler)
OverflowError: long too big to convert
```

I think this is the expected feedback under my new environment
#### Output of ``pd.show_versions()``
